A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unforgettable story and felt smallnwith only 6 locations in the entire film. Luke's character didn't follow from the original instead becoming a weak minded jedi best known for a padawan. Kylo Ren definitely stole the show and was the best part of this movie. Rey didn't make any mistakes again and still had all the answers and knew exactly where to go to save the day. Oh and NO LIGHTSABER BATTLE NOT ONE!!!!!!
